How to install:
1. Run MysteryPI The New York Fortune_setup.exe

#################################################

About the game:

Seek and find your way through the Big Apple in Mystery P.I. - The New York Fortune! A fun-loving & eccentric billionaire has hidden the will to his fortune somewhere in New York City. Track it down by locating 2100 hidden objects at 25 amazing NY locations like Times Square, Central Park, and Coney Island. Mystery P.I. - The New York Fortune offers three addictive ways to play. In the first, NY Fortune mode, you must find the clues to locate the will. Collect all the keys & apples to unlock two unlimited game modes: Unlimited Seek & Find and Spot the Differences. Get started seeking in this next installment of the popular Mystery P.I. series!
